summary: A comprehensive unit‑test suite that exercises the Cython compiler’s command‑line parser, checking that various flags, options, warnings, directives, code‑embedding directives, debugging and coverage settings are interpreted correctly and that related side‑effects such as option backup and restoration behave as expected.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the Cython command‑line interface so that developers and end‑users can compile source code with the intended configuration, preventing regressions in option handling and improving overall tool stability.
